>
[Instrument of Zeal](/Feats.aspx?ID=257) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 115 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (blade)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4); [tenets of good](/Tenets.aspx?ID=1)

</column>

---

Divine energy fills your weapon. Whenever you critically hit a foe with [Blade of Justice](/Feats.aspx?ID=244) or a Retributive Strike, your attack adds an extra damage die, and the target is slowed 1 on its next turn.
